headline.main: Celts Close In on Playoffs, Rout Cavaliers 117-78
headline.print_headline: Celts Close In on Playoffs, Rout Cavaliers 117-78

docs.snippet: Celtics coach Brad Stevens didn't get carried away by Boston's rout of a Cleveland team that bore little resemblance to the real Cavaliers....
docs.lead_paragraph: Celtics coach Brad Stevens didn't get carried away by Boston's rout of a Cleveland team that bore little resemblance to the real Cavaliers.

headline.main: Villarreal's Musacchio Has Successful Operation After Horror Injury
headline.print_headline: Villarreal's Musacchio Has Successful Operation After Horror Injury

docs.snippet: Villarreal's Argentina defender Mateo Musacchio has undergone a successful operation following a nasty ankle injury in his side’s draw with Getafe in La Liga on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Villarreal's Argentina defender Mateo Musacchio has undergone a successful operation following a nasty ankle injury in his side’s draw with Getafe in La Liga on Sunday.

headline.main: Marquez Completes Hat-Trick of Wins in Austin
headline.print_headline: Marquez Completes Hat-Trick of Wins in Austin

docs.snippet: MotoGP world champion Marc Marquez roared back to his dominant best with a commanding win from pole position in the Grand Prix of the Americas on Sunday after a start delayed by water on the track....
docs.lead_paragraph: MotoGP world champion Marc Marquez roared back to his dominant best with a commanding win from pole position in the Grand Prix of the Americas on Sunday after a start delayed by water on the track.

headline.main: Chelsea's Mourinho Plays Down Missiles Problem
headline.print_headline: Chelsea's Mourinho Plays Down Missiles Problem

docs.snippet: Chelsea manager Jose Mourinho chose to make light of his players being pelted with objects from the crowd following their late winner in a 1-0 victory at West London rivals Queens Park Rangers on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Chelsea manager Jose Mourinho chose to make light of his players being pelted with objects from the crowd following their late winner in a 1-0 victory at West London rivals Queens Park Rangers on Sunday.

headline.main: Wisconsin Students' Rice Krispies Treat a Snap, Crackle, Colossus
headline.print_headline: Wisconsin Students' Rice Krispies Treat a Snap, Crackle, Colossus

headline.main: Marseille's Bordeaux Jinx Continues With 1-0 Defeat
headline.print_headline: Marseille's Bordeaux Jinx Continues With 1-0 Defeat

docs.snippet: Olympique de Marseille's Ligue 1 title hopes suffered a major setback when their 37-year winless streak at Girondins de Bordeaux continued with a 1-0 defeat at Chaban Delmas on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Olympique de Marseille's Ligue 1 title hopes suffered a major setback when their 37-year winless streak at Girondins de Bordeaux continued with a 1-0 defeat at Chaban Delmas on Sunday.

headline.main: A look at Clinton's lighter side, family life
headline.sub: A look at Clinton's lighter side, family life

docs.snippet: Laughing, dancing, applying lipstick --- Hillary Clinton  loosened the reins on her closely managed public persona in the years following her first White House run.  Rough Cut (no reporter narration)...

headline.main: Sale Helps Chicago White Sox Beat Minnesota Twins 6-2
headline.print_headline: Sale Helps Chicago White Sox Beat Minnesota Twins 6-2

docs.snippet: Chris Sale pitched six solid innings in his return from a foot injury, and the Chicago White Sox beat the Minnesota Twins 6-2 on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Chris Sale pitched six solid innings in his return from a foot injury, and the Chicago White Sox beat the Minnesota Twins 6-2 on Sunday.
